#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define M 1000000007

int main ()
{
	int T; // Number of test cases
	char S[10001]; // Each input
	int i, j, k, l, m, n, a, b, c, d; // Loop variables
	int sum; // Sum of the digits of each number we test
	int S_len; // Length of the input string
	int occurrence[10]; // Number of occurrences of each digit in the input
	int usage_digit[10]; // Number of occurrences of each digit in the sums
	long long temp, result; // Calculating the final result
	cin >> T;
	for (i = 0; i < T; i++)
	{
		cin >> S;
		S_len = strlen(S);
		for (k = 0; k < 10; k++)
        {
            occurrence[k] = 0;
        }
		for (j = 0; j < S_len; j++)
        {
            S[j] -= '0';
            occurrence[S[j]]++;
        }
        result = 0;
		for (a = 0; a < 11; a++)
        {
            for (b = a; b < 11; b++)
            {
                for (c = b; c < 11; c++)
                {
                    for (d = c; d < 11; d++)
                    {
                        sum = 0;
                        for (n = 0; n < 10; n++)
                        {
                            usage_digit[n] = 0;
                        }
                        if (a < 10)
                        {
                            sum += a;
                            usage_digit[a]++;
                        }
                        if (b < 10)
                        {
                            sum += b;
                            usage_digit[b]++;
                        }
                        if (c < 10)
                        {
                            sum += c;
                            usage_digit[c]++;
                        }
                        if (d < 10)
                        {
                            sum += d;
                            usage_digit[d]++;
                        }
                        if (sum == 0 || (sum % 9 != 0))
                        {
                            continue;
                        }
                        temp = 1;
                        for (l = 0; l < 10; l++)
                        {
                            for (m = 0; m < usage_digit[l]; m++)
                            {
                                temp = temp * (occurrence[l] - m) / (m + 1);
                            }
                        }
                        result += temp;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        printf ("%d\n", (int) (result % M));
	}
	return 0;
}
